params._decision: Approval decision Accepted or Rejected, true or false

params._id: Id of dweet on which reward is to be claimed
Id of comment to be Deleted

getUserComments().details: Though onlyAllowedUser can be bypassed easily but still keeping for calls from frontend

params._id: Id of dweet to be likeDweet

params.list: Array of dweet Ids reported by user

params._coverHash: Ipfs Hash of user cover Image
params._imgHash: Ipfs Hash of users Profile Image

params._dweetId: Id of the dweet to be reported

returns.status: status of claim reported or claimed

params._user: Address of user to be removed from maintainer

params._imgHash: Ipfs hash of image to be shown as advertisement

params._action: ban or free, true or false

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to connect to decentralised social network, share your content to the world in a decentralised way!
